headline: 3 Stocks to Avoid as Software Sector Stumbles
summary: Software stocks are struggling as we enter 2026. Can this sector turn it around this year, or do new AI advances spell more trouble for the beleaguered sector?

headline: Wolfe Research Sees Strong AI Momentum at Salesforce, Inc. (CRM)
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is among the stocks with the best earnings growth for the next 5 years. On January 15, Wolfe Research maintained an ‘Outperform’ rating on Salesforce, Inc. headline: Did Ericsson's Swedish Job Cuts and Vonage AI Push Just Reframe Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson's (OM:ERIC B) Investment Narrative?
summary: In mid-January 2026, Ericsson announced plans to cut about 1,600 jobs in Sweden as part of a broader global cost-efficiency program intended to support its network technology focus. At the same time, subsidiary Vonage rolled out an AI-enabled, Salesforce-integrated messaging tool, highlighting Ericsson’s push to pair cost savings with higher-value, programmable communications services. We’ll now examine how Ericsson’s planned Swedish headcount reduction could influence its previously...
